pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model Visualisation Toolbox for 'easystats' and 'ggplot2' // Provides plotting utilities supporting packages in the 'easystats' ecosystem (https://github.com/easystats/easystats) and some extra themes, geoms, and scales for 'ggplot2'. Color scales are based on https://materialui.co/. References: Ldecke et al. (2021) doi:10.21105/joss.03393.
